vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding consideration of amending Chapters 51A of the Dallas Development Code, with consideration to be given to amending Section 51A-4.507, “Neighborhood Stabilization Overlay” and related sections including but not limited to amending regulations related to height plane definition and how height is measured and an ordinance granting the amendments
Recommendation of Staff: Approval 
Recommendation of CPC: Approval 
DCA223-007(AG)

Recommendation of Staff: Approval 
Recommendation of CPC: Approval 
DCA223-007(AG)
